game.title: The Lost Key
game.objective: Find the key to unlock the secret door
game.description: Explore the hidden chambers and solve puzzles to find the lost key that will unlock the secret door.

task.description: Investigate the library to uncover the hidden entrance to the first chamber.
In the first chamber, there is an ancient scroll that holds vital clues. Retrieve it from the pedestal.
Use the ancient scroll to decipher the riddle that will lead you to the secret door.
Find the key hidden in the hidden stash inside the Secret Chamber and use it to unlock the secret door.
